title: (x) "A.L. Affordable" brush style script, old sign painter look - Blaze {Akira}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127013004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AL-Affordable-identify_5401.jpg)

This is located on a company van as a vinyl application. I've tried Identifont and What the font and the standard font foundries to no avail. I notice that the crosspiece on the "A" and the "ff" are pretty unique.

Thanks, Kevin
author: huntunlimited

comments.content:
Thanks Akira that's it exactly.  
Kevin
